mapper.select: select sum(v.votes_cast_count) as totalVotes, g.* FROM galgame_twelve_voting v LEFT JOIN galgame g ON v.galgame_subject_id = g.subject_id GROUP BY v.galgame_subject_id ORDER BY totalVotes DESC

select v.id, v.votes_cast_count, g.subject_id, g.img_url, g.translated_name FROM galgame_twelve_voting v LEFT JOIN galgame g ON v.galgame_subject_id = g.subject_id where user_uin = #{uin} GROUP BY v.galgame_subject_id
select sum(v.votes_cast_count) as votesCastCount FROM galgame_twelve_voting v where user_uin = #{uin}

select v.id, v.votes_cast_count, g.subject_id, g.img_url, g.translated_name, g.original_name, g.rank, g.number_of_ratings, g.info, g.score, t.total_votes from galgame_twelve_voting v left join galgame g on v.galgame_subject_id = g.subject_id left join ( select galgame_subject_id, sum(votes_cast_count) as total_votes from galgame_twelve_voting group by galgame_subject_id ) t on v.galgame_subject_id = t.galgame_subject_id where v.user_uin = #{uin} and v.galgame_subject_id = #{subjectId}

SELECT total_rank FROM ( SELECT galgame_subject_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY sum(votes_cast_count) DESC) AS total_rank FROM galgame_twelve_voting GROUP BY galgame_subject_id ) AS rank_table WHERE galgame_subject_id = #{subjectId}

select sum(v.votes_cast_count) as totalVotes FROM galgame_twelve_voting v LEFT JOIN galgame g ON v.galgame_subject_id = g.subject_id WHERE v.galgame_subject_id = #{subjectId} GROUP BY v.galgame_subject_id
